texts.label: text
texts.orig: Gaspar Olafsen, farmer
texts.text: Gaspar Olafsen, farmer

texts.label: text
texts.orig: When I started farming there were 40,000 dairy farmer in Denmark. Now there are 3000
texts.text: When I started farming there were 40,000 dairy farmer in Denmark. Now there are 3000

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Full payback in 2 years
texts.text: Full payback in 2 years

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We have an old family dairy farm, the farm has been in the family since 1660 and we bought the farm form my wife’s parents in 1982.
texts.text: We have an old family dairy farm, the farm has been in the family since 1660 and we bought the farm form my wife’s parents in 1982.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We have 530 cows, Holstein and 458 erlands.
texts.text: We have 530 cows, Holstein and 458 erlands.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We have used Fair Farm Technologies for the last 5 ½ years, it’s been very good, it’s a very good system. The last 8 months we have tested a new system for Fair Farm, CattleWatch. We are one of five herds in Europe that has this new system.
texts.text: We have used Fair Farm Technologies for the last 5 ½ years, it’s been very good, it’s a very good system. The last 8 months we have tested a new system for Fair Farm, CattleWatch. We are one of five herds in Europe that has this new system.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The new system in my opinion
texts.text: The new system in my opinion

texts.label: text
texts.orig: You can have a lot of information in the CattleWatch system. You can see how long the cows are lying down, how many hours they are walking around, and you get a sense of how the cow is feeling, it’s welfare. You can see how long the cows are lying down, how many hours they are walking around, and you get a sense of how the cow is feeling. If a cow is lying too long, maybe it is sick. And on my iPhone I can even see which part of the stable she is in.
texts.text: You can have a lot of information in the CattleWatch system. You can see how long the cows are lying down, how many hours they are walking around, and you get a sense of how the cow is feeling, it’s welfare. You can see how long the cows are lying down, how many hours they are walking around, and you get a sense of how the cow is feeling. If a cow is lying too long, maybe it is sick. And on my iPhone I can even see which part of the stable she is in.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: If I touch cow number 2891 on my iPhone, about 2 seconds later I can see where the cow is.
texts.text: If I touch cow number 2891 on my iPhone, about 2 seconds later I can see where the cow is.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: It will take care of the cow so that I can in my mind have more cows, and also I have a system where I can take care of the cows, because on my farm I’m aiming to have 1000 cows in five years.
texts.text: It will take care of the cow so that I can in my mind have more cows, and also I have a system where I can take care of the cows, because on my farm I’m aiming to have 1000 cows in five years.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: So we must have a system to help me. To take care of the cow and this new system, it’s much better than the old system we have.
texts.text: So we must have a system to help me. To take care of the cow and this new system, it’s much better than the old system we have.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: I can on the computer see where the cow sits down in the different parts of the stable. If you can help the cows two days earlier, they are not so sick and easier to treat. That is very important information. If you can help the cows two days before, it is money. A cow that is not so sick is easier to treat
texts.text: I can on the computer see where the cow sits down in the different parts of the stable. If you can help the cows two days earlier, they are not so sick and easier to treat. That is very important information. If you can help the cows two days before, it is money. A cow that is not so sick is easier to treat

texts.label: text
texts.orig: You can see in the system when a cow is beginning to be not so happy. It can tell me two days before I can see it with my eyes
texts.text: You can see in the system when a cow is beginning to be not so happy. It can tell me two days before I can see it with my eyes

texts.label: text
texts.orig: You can see in the system when a cow is beginning to be not so happy. It’s very important that  you can see on the system before you can see with your eyes. The system can tell me two days before I can see with my eyes. So it’s a very important information the system can give me.
texts.text: You can see in the system when a cow is beginning to be not so happy. It’s very important that  you can see on the system before you can see with your eyes. The system can tell me two days before I can see with my eyes. So it’s a very important information the system can give me.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Of course it will save money, because when you can handle two days before you normally would do it, if you can help the cows two days before, it’s money, because the cow, not being so sick, is easier to treat. It’s more money for the farmers when you llearn to use the system.
texts.text: Of course it will save money, because when you can handle two days before you normally would do it, if you can help the cows two days before, it’s money, because the cow, not being so sick, is easier to treat. It’s more money for the farmers when you llearn to use the system.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: You cannot run the farm today like you did 30 years ago.
texts.text: You cannot run the farm today like you did 30 years ago.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: The prices are lower, the costs are higher. You need help to keep the cows healthy and the farm profitable.
texts.text: The prices are lower, the costs are higher. You need help to keep the cows healthy and the farm profitable.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: When you learn and trust the system it is a very good help for managing your herd. It can save money, and it makes it possible to look after more cows.
texts.text: When you learn and trust the system it is a very good help for managing your herd. It can save money, and it makes it possible to look after more cows.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: To do that, you must have a system to help you take care of the animals. This new one is much better than the old system
texts.text: To do that, you must have a system to help you take care of the animals. This new one is much better than the old system

texts.label: text
texts.orig: You have to learn to use the system. You need to trust the system.
texts.text: You have to learn to use the system. You need to trust the system.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: When you learn and trust the system it’s very good help for the management of your herd.
texts.text: When you learn and trust the system it’s very good help for the management of your herd.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: It’s very difficult to learn. I tried to do it slowly.
texts.text: It’s very difficult to learn. I tried to do it slowly.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: It’s middle to good soil we have.
texts.text: It’s middle to good soil we have.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: On the fields we grow maize, wheat and grass.
texts.text: On the fields we grow maize, wheat and grass.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: I like to see everything is growing. I like to see my employees
texts.text: I like to see everything is growing. I like to see my employees

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We have
texts.text: We have

texts.label: text
texts.orig: For us we have 8 employees, it’s very important for me to see
texts.text: For us we have 8 employees, it’s very important for me to see

texts.label: text
texts.orig: We want to be in the ten per cent
texts.text: We want to be in the ten per cent

texts.label: text
texts.orig: I can see things growing and I can also my employments are growing.
texts.text: I can see things growing and I can also my employments are growing.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: If this helps my cows stay healthier and my farm stay alive, then it matters. We cannot afford to stand still
texts.text: If this helps my cows stay healthier and my farm stay alive, then it matters. We cannot afford to stand still
